retrieval.name: Knowledge Base
retrieval.description: Please go to the knowledge base of the open platform to upload documents, and then use the knowledge base function for retrieval.

knowledge_id.name: Knowledge Base ID
knowledge_id.description: When it comes to knowledge base ID, please go to the knowledge base module of the open platform to create or obtain it (it is the knowledge base ID, not the document ID!)

prompt_template.name: Knowledge Base Template
prompt_template.description: Knowledge base template when requesting the model, please check the documentation to fill it in, otherwise do not fill it in

web_search.name: Web Search
web_search.description: Use the web search function to search for the content entered by the user

web_browser.name: Search Tool
web_browser.description: Use the search tool function, only valid for glm-4-alltools

enable.name: Enable
enable.description: Whether to enable the search tool

drawing_tool.name: Drawing Tool
drawing_tool.description: Use the drawing tool function, only valid for glm-4-alltools

enable.name: Enable
enable.description: Whether to enable the drawing tool

code_interpreter.name: Code Tool
code_interpreter.description: Use the code tool function, only valid for glm-4-alltools

sandbox.name: Sandbox Mode
sandbox.description: auto automatically calls the sandbox environment to execute code, none does not enable the sandbox environment, required

enable.name: Enable
enable.description: Whether to enable the use of OpenAI API, enable it to directly use Baidu's official OpenAI-compatible API, no longer do type conversion, and the above plugins are invalid

web_search.name: Web Search
web_search.description: Use the web search function to search for the content entered by the user

enable.name: Enable
enable.description: Whether to enable the use of OpenAI API, enable to directly use ali's official OpenAI-compatible API, no type conversion is done, and the above plug-ins are invalid

voice.name: Voice Mapping
voice.description: Map OpenAI's voice roles to azure's voice roles. If there is a role, please use | to separate them, for example, zh-CN-YunxiNeural|boy

headers.name: Header Configuration
headers.description: This configuration is mainly used to configure the header when using cloudflare Zero Trust to expose the port to the public network

code_execution.name: Code Execution
code_execution.description: Use the code execution function. After enabling, the calculation of tokens is not accurate. It is recommended to enable it for personal use.

enable.name: Enable
enable.description: Whether to enable the use of OpenAI API.  If enabled, use the official Gemini API compatible with OpenAI directly, without type conversion.

voice.name: Voice Mapping
voice.description: Map OpenAI voice roles to Minimax voice roles.  If there's an emotion, separate with |, e.g., female-chengshu|happy

customize.name: Custom Parameters
customize.description: You can customize the address of each request.  Empty is the default value, disable is to disable the request.
